QuestData.Title: The Grimtotem Plot
QuestData.Description: With the activities of the Grimtotems in Thousand Needles brought to light, many tauren now regard them with suspicion. We've seen high-ranking Grimtotems engage in murder and kidnapping to advance their interests and I fear we may become their next target.$B$BBlackhoof Village, to the northeast, near Bluefen, is a large new Grimtotem settlement. Their leaders, the elders, will all have orders from Thunder Bluff. See if you can capture the orders and piece them together to learn the Grimtotems' plans.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 4 Grimtotem Notes from Grimtotem Elders and combine them to form the full Grimtotem Battle Plan.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to find any trace of the orders?
QuestData.RewardText: <Krog reads over the battle plan.>$B$BThere's no doubt in my mind that the Grimtotems are moving against the humans. What I don't understand is what their intentions are toward us. We knew nothing of these plans and we lost a good man because of it. I don't trust that we're not next on their list.
